# Comparing a small dataset to this

```{r, dtwclust}
eg_df <- generate_toy_climate_data(num_reps = 10)
out_dtw <- dtw::dtwDist(
  t(as.matrix(eg_df)),
  open.end = TRUE,
  open.begin = TRUE,
  step.pattern = dtw::asymmetric
)
diag(out_dtw) <- NA
```

```{r, analysis}

# plot the most similar timeseries
example_min <- which(out_dtw == min(out_dtw, na.rm = TRUE), arr.ind = TRUE)
matplot(eg_df[, example_min[1,]], type = "l", lty = 1)

# plot the most different timeseries
example_max <- which(out_dtw == max(out_dtw, na.rm = TRUE), arr.ind = TRUE)
matplot(eg_df[, example_max[1,]], type = "l", lty = 1)
```
